alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 2:06AM MST until December 26 at 2:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 2 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Patchy blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Ziebach County and Haakon County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 2 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
